entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
